verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Keep <S%H8104><s%> all the commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And it shall be on the day <S%H3117><s%> when you shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H6965><s%>, that you shall set you up great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and plaster <S%H7874><s%> them with plaster <S%H7875><s%>:

And you shall write <S%H3789><s%> upon them all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%>, when you are passed over <S%H5674><s%>, that you may go in <S%H935><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H776><s%>, a land that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>; as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> has promised you <S%H1696><s%>.

Therefore it shall be when you be gone over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, that you shall set up <S%H6965><s%> these stones <S%H68><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, in mountain <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%>, and you shall plaster <S%H7875><s%> them with plaster <S%H7874><s%>.

And there shall you build <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, an altar <S%H4196><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>: you shall not lift up <S%H5130><s%> any iron tool upon them <S%H1270><s%>.

You shall build <S%H1129><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> of whole <S%H8003><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>: and you shall offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> on it unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>:
And you shall offer <S%H2076><s%> peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, and shall eat <S%H398><s%> there <S%H8055><s%>, and rejoice before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
And you shall write <S%H3789><s%> upon the stones <S%H68><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%> very <S%H3190><s%> plainly <S%H874><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Take care <S%H5535><s%>, and listen <S%H8085><s%>, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>; this day <S%H3117><s%> you are become <S%H1961><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

You shall therefore obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

These shall stand <S%H5975><s%> upon mountain <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim <S%H1630><s%> to bless <S%H1288><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, when you are come over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>; Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, and Levi <S%H3878><s%>, and Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, and Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>:

And these shall stand <S%H5975><s%> upon mountain <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%> to curse <S%H7045><s%>; Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and Asher <S%H836><s%>, and Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, Dan <S%H1835><s%>, and Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>.
And the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall speak <S%H6030><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with a loud <S%H7311><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>,

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that makes <S%H6213><s%> any engraved <S%H6459><s%> or molten image <S%H4541><s%>, an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the craftsman <S%H2796><s%>, and puts <S%H7760><s%> it in a secret <S%H5643><s%> place <S%H5971><s%>. And all the people shall answer <S%H6030><s%> and say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that sets light <S%H7034><s%> by his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother <S%H517><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that removes <S%H5253><s%> his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>'s landmark <S%H1366><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that makes the blind <S%H5787><s%> to wander <S%H7686><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that perverts <S%H5186><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and widow <S%H490><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that lies <S%H7901><s%> with his father <S%H1><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>; because he uncovers <S%H1540><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>'s skirt <S%H3671><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that lies <S%H7901><s%> with any manner of animal <S%H929><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that lies <S%H7901><s%> with his sister <S%H269><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, or the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that lies <S%H7901><s%> with his mother in law <S%H2859><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that strikes <S%H5221><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> secretly <S%H5643><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that takes <S%H3947><s%> reward <S%H7810><s%> to kill <S%H5221><s%> an innocent <S%H5355><s%> person <S%H5315><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that confirms <S%H6965><s%> not all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H5971><s%>. And all the people shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.
